org.apache.spark

Class ContextCleanerSuiteBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scalatest.FunSuite
      • org.apache.spark.ContextCleanerSuiteBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalSparkContext, Logging
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContextCleanerSuite, SortShuffleContextCleanerSuite

    public abstract class ContextCleanerSuiteBase
extends org.scalatest.FunSuite
implements LocalSparkContext
    An abstract base class for context cleaner tests, which sets up a context with a config suitable for cleaner tests and provides some utility functions. Subclasses can use different config options, in particular, a different shuffle manager class

      • withFixture

        protected final org.scalatest.Outcome withFixture(org.scalatest.Suite.NoArgTest test)
        Log the suite name and the test name before and after each test.

        Subclasses should never override this method. If they wish to run custom code before and after each test, they should mix in the {{org.scalatest.BeforeAndAfter}} trait instead.
